title: Heartfelt enough? UK PM Johnson's future uncertain after party apology
content:
1. Heartfelt enough? UK PM Johnson's future uncertain after party apology  Reuters UK
  2. Boris Johnson: Senior Tories urge PM to quit after party apology  BBC News
  3. Hear Boris Johnson's statement to Parliament amid lockdown party row  CNN
  4. Finally the Tory papers have caught on that Johnson is a liar – what kept them?  The Guardian
  5. The Guardian view on Boris Johnson’s apologetic defence: so begins an era of political chaos  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
